channel.title: * Broken Days * hard mode pvp survival * [Factions] [mcmmo]
channel.description:
I'm Paulbunyan99 and the owner, its been a bit of work to get this up and running, I plan on continueing to improve and expand the server as time goes on. It is brand new so im currently looking for staff, though those interested would need to join and get to know me first.
The Server provides a free waste land to roam and capture solo or with your faction. It provides a some what demanding gameplay due to it being on hardmode. A town market and End being for events such as CTF arena, FFA arena, Spleef, and more.
Server Rules No hacking* Hacking of any kind will result in a permanent ban (A hack is anything that gives you an unfair advantage over other players, including, but not limited to, keybinds, texture-packs, healthacks, speedhacks, etc).
No harassing other players This includes, but is not limited to, harassment of ethnic, racial, or sexual grounds. Breaking of this rule will result in a temporary or permanent ban depending on the severity of the harassment as well as the frequency of said harassment. All of the above in general are accepted if not directed to a person,"harassing"
No logging out to avoid combat Disconnecting during or to avoid combat is not allowed. If you were disconnect for any reason, log back in immediately. Breaking this rule will result in a temporary ban. This may result in a permanent ban if this frequently occurs.
No excessive swearing Cursing is allowed, however excessive swearing is not. This also includes swearing on sexual and/or ethnical or racial grounds. Breaking this rule will result in a temporary ban and possibly escalate into a permanent ban depending on the severity and frequency.
Respect the admins First and foremost, cursing and harassing admins is not acceptable when they are performing their duties. Breaking this rule will result in a temporary ban alternatively a permanent ban in case of repeated offences.
No Spamming Over excessive spamming is forbidden and will be inforced. Breaking this rule "could" possibly lead to temporary ban if player has been warned multiple times.
game Modification Rules ------------------------- Using any of the following mods that are not allowed will result in an immediate permanent ban. Are the following allowed:
1. Mini-Map: Yes 2. Texture Packages: Yes 3. Fly Mod: No 4. Bots/Scripts/AFKleveling: No 5. High Jump/Climb Mods: No 6. X-ray: No 7. Nukers: No 8. Long-Reach: No 9. Brightness Mods: No
-> Server IP- 72.185.185.57:25565
Currently using the following ranks: Citizin:default Donator:self explanitory Guide: step below a mod, helps run things that dont require moderator abilities. Moderator Admin
Plugins: -ChestShop -Essentials -Factions -Falsebook -Herochat -iConomy -Konsept Gate -LWC -mcMMO -PermissionsEx -PersonalChest -pvparena -Safe Creeper -WorldGuard and a few other that enhance mods abilitys to run the server.

item.title: * Broken Days * hard mode pvp survival * [Factions] [mcmmo]
item.dc:creator: @justinxvi justinxvi
item.description:
@justinxvi wrote:

I’m Paulbunyan99 and the owner, its been a bit of work to get this up and running, I plan on continueing to improve and expand the server as time goes on. It is brand new so im currently looking for staff, though those interested would need to join and get to know me first.

The Server provides a free waste land to roam and capture solo or with your faction. It provides a some what demanding gameplay due to it being on hardmode. A town market and End being for events such as CTF arena, FFA arena, Spleef, and more.

Server Rules
No hacking*
Hacking of any kind will result in a permanent ban (A hack is anything that gives you an unfair advantage over other players, including, but not limited to, keybinds, texture-packs, healthacks, speedhacks, etc).

No harassing other players
This includes, but is not limited to, harassment of ethnic, racial, or sexual grounds. Breaking of this rule will result in a temporary or permanent ban depending on the severity of the harassment as well as the frequency of said harassment. All of the above in general are accepted if not directed to a person,“harassing”

No logging out to avoid combat
Disconnecting during or to avoid combat is not allowed. If you were disconnect for any reason, log back in immediately. Breaking this rule will result in a temporary ban. This may result in a permanent ban if this frequently occurs.

No excessive swearing
Cursing is allowed, however excessive swearing is not. This also includes swearing on sexual and/or ethnical or racial grounds. Breaking this rule will result in a temporary ban and possibly escalate into a permanent ban depending on the severity and frequency.

Respect the admins
First and foremost, cursing and harassing admins is not acceptable when they are performing their duties. Breaking this rule will result in a temporary ban alternatively a permanent ban in case of repeated offences.

No Spamming
Over excessive spamming is forbidden and will be inforced. Breaking this rule “could” possibly lead to temporary ban if player has been warned multiple times.

game Modification Rules

Using any of the following mods that are not allowed will result in an immediate permanent ban.
Are the following allowed:

  1. Mini-Map: Yes
  2. Texture Packages: Yes
  3. Fly Mod: No
  4. Bots/Scripts/AFKleveling: No
  5. High Jump/Climb Mods: No
  6. X-ray: No
  7. Nukers: No
  8. Long-Reach: No
  9. Brightness Mods: No

-> Server IP- 72.185.185.57:25565

Currently using the following ranks:
Citizin:default
Donator:self explanitory
Guide: step below a mod, helps run things that dont require moderator abilities.
Moderator
Admin

Plugins:
-ChestShop
-Essentials
-Factions
-Falsebook
-Herochat
-iConomy
-Konsept Gate
-LWC
-mcMMO
-PermissionsEx
-PersonalChest
-pvparena
-Safe Creeper
-WorldGuard
and a few other that enhance mods abilitys to run the server.
